授業目的:
Students will work on extending their fluency of expression through activities centered around a topics-based syllabus. Critical thinking with a cross-cultural perspective will be fostered on a range of topical issues to do with lifestyles, customs and behavior, with the intention of raising student awareness of aspects of their own culture and similarities or differences in other cultures. Vocabulary work will seek to broaden understanding of collocation patterns and familiarity with idiomatic.
language.
到達目標: Students will be able to express their opinions in short speeches. They will also acquire basic skills for and knowledge about personal and business letter writing, journal writing, and the process involved in writing outlines, drafting, editing and revising essays.
特記事項: 本授業科目は、“オンライン授業60単位制限対象科目”ではありません。 The course is not subject to the 60-credit limit for online courses.
授業方法: Lecture, Class participation, listening exercises, video lessons, interviews with the teacher. If in-person classes are not possible classes using Zoom or Google classroom will be used. Instructions will be given on LUNA Announcement board. Students are required to check LUNA prior to class for updates from the instructor.
